select CO_TYPE , CO_NO , CODE , SEQ , CO_DETAIL , HIDE , ACTIVE from CODE where 1 = 1 and CO_TYPE = #{codeType}
and HIDE in ('0', '1')
and HIDE = '0'
and HIDE = '0'
and ACTIVE = '1'
order by cast(SEQ as signed)

select CODE from CODE where 1 = 1 and CO_NO = #{CO_NO} and CO_TYPE = #{CO_TYPE}
and HIDE in ('0', '1')
and HIDE = '0'
and HIDE = '0'
and ACTIVE = '1'

select CO_TYPE , CO_NO , CODE , HIDE from MESSAGE where 1 = 1 and CO_TYPE = #{codeType}
and HIDE in ('0', '1')
and HIDE = '0'
order by cast(CO_NO as signed)
